landing.title: SoulBox
landing.headline: Preserve your digital legacy.
landing.subheadline: SoulBox allows you to create a digital clone of yourself, secure your memories, and pass them on to your loved ones, forever.
landing.feature1Desc: Answer questions and import your writings so your clone can learn your personality, humor, and way of speaking.
landing.feature2Desc: Deposit messages, photos, and important documents in a tamper-proof digital vault, protected by your trusted guardians.
landing.feature3Desc: Your loved ones will be able to interact with your clone, receive your messages, and feel your presence, even when you are no longer there.

loginPage.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email to receive instructions.
loginPage.procheTokenPrompt: A secret token has been shared with you. Please enter it.
loginPage.forgotPasswordSuccess: If an account is associated with {{email}}, a password reset email has been sent.

dashboard.subheadline: Here is an overview of your digital clone.
dashboard.step1: Go to the <1>Training Center</1> to start shaping your clone's personality.
dashboard.step2: Set up your <1>Voice Clone</1> for a more immersive experience.
dashboard.step3: Deposit your first memories and important messages in the <1>Digital Vault</1>.
dashboard.step4: Define <1>Sharing Channels</1> to decide who can interact with your clone.

vault.title: Digital Vault
vault.subheadline: Securely store your most important messages, documents, and memories.

channels.title: Sharing Channels
channels.subheadline: Manage the people (beneficiaries) who can interact with your clone and access your vault.
channels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this beneficiary?
channels.modalSecretQuestion: Secret question (e.g., Name of my first dog?)

voiceClone.title: Voice Clone
voiceClone.subheadline: Train a version of your voice for more personal and immersive interactions.
voiceClone.step1Desc: Record 3 to 5 short samples of your voice reading a text. Speak naturally.

voiceClone.noSampleError: Please record at least one voice sample.

voiceClone.testInstructions: Enter some text below to have it read by your clone.
voiceClone.deleteAndRestart: Delete this clone and start over

billing.title: Subscriptions
billing.subheadline: Choose the plan that best suits your needs to preserve your digital legacy.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.subheadline: Manage your personal information, connections, and security settings.
settings.googleDriveDesc: Back up your training data to your Drive.

trainingCenter.title: Training Center
trainingCenter.subheadline: Shape your clone's personality to be as much like you as possible.
trainingCenter.quizDesc: Answer these questions to define your clone's core traits. This is the most important source.
trainingCenter.saveSuccessDrive: Training saved to Google Drive. Your clone is now updated for your relatives!
trainingCenter.saveSuccessLocal: Training saved! Your clone is now updated for your relatives. Consider connecting Google Drive in Settings for a secure backup.

driveModal.title: Connect Google Drive
driveModal.description: Securely back up your training data (personality, memories, documents) to your own Google Drive.
